attributes.title: TERRIBLE
attributes.review: This app is terrible. It made my cat vomit! I was playing with my cat while on the app and my cat came near my phone and started coughing a lot and vomited on my phone. She kept hitting my phone as if something she didn’t like was there! I DO NOT RECOMMEND THIS APP!

attributes.title: Not worth the time!
attributes.review: I decided to download this app and the second I did, my phone deleted every piece of information I ever had on it. I don’t know how to fix it and the only app left is this one! HELP!

attributes.title: this cheeto head better not cancel tiktok
attributes.review: this app is complete bull😤 when you open it it automatically sends an asteroid to your house🥵 i literally only have 00:23:12 left to live🥺 RIP to me i guess✌️

attributes.title: HORRIBLE
attributes.review: So first I went to see what the app was abt. The app is so glitchy and it is so slow. But that’s not it it literally powered off my phone and I had to wait 1 hour to get back on my phone. Don’t get this app!!!

attributes.title: DO NOT GET
attributes.review: This is TRASH TRASH I got it then my hair turned blue but at first I was like that’s fine because I still have my wallet but thennnn I lost my left shoe now how am I supposed to sing honey to kiss with a purple dress I can’t believe my goldfish just turned 2

attributes.title: disgustingly horrifying app
attributes.review: DELETE THIS APP. it’s a$s and the cheeto keeps popping up and freezing my phone there’s glitching and i’m pretty sure there’s a virus in it. this app needs to be deleted from history and never brought back periodt.

attributes.title: MUST BE DESTROYED
attributes.review: This is the worst app ever created, it should have never been invented. It stole all of my information and is brainwashing the nation into believing that Trump is actually capable of remaining in office. If society has any braincells left they would know to get rid of this app.

attributes.title: Dumbest app ever automatic 1 star review
attributes.review: I tried the app but then weird people came to my house and stole all my cats. No one was held accountable for this crime and later I got a video of a man petting them. This is all the apps fault it is absolutely horrible and disgusting.

attributes.title: This app ain’t it .
attributes.review: This app made my phone glitch immediately after I downloaded it . It made my phone hot and I felt like it was gonna blow up . I need to get a new phone now . Don’t get this app your phone will blow up 😪🐥🧕🏿👑

attributes.title: Messed up my phone
attributes.review:
My phone was working fine, but as soon as I got this app it started glitching and now sometimes it freezes! 
I do not recommend it.
